_sText:
Well heres my first attempt at making a player controlled weapon.

Its a Turret that comes out of the ceiling, controlled from a control panel that can be placed anywhere. It has a camera mounted on gun barrel so you could be in a different room controlling it and see on the screen where your shooting etc..

HUGE thanks to uberkirsche for helping me make this and fixing all the bugs, before release.

Anyway heres a video - sorry for crappy quality again
- Song The Pretender, by the Foo Fighters.
(the white hostage for some reason dint want to die.. no idea why)
<embed style="width:400px; height:326px;" id="VideoPlayback" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://video.google.com/googleplayer.swf?docId=7427009240684180930&hl=en" flashvars=""> </embed>

Any way have fun with it :D
